document_data.name: Tethir
document_data.mainbody: '''Tethir the Dragonslayer''' was an [[Elf|elven]] hero and the first elven dragonslayer.
document_data.Relationships: Tethir was related to the elven hero [[Keltormir (elf)|Keltormir]].
document_data.History: Tethir sacrificed his own life to slay two [[Dragon aging|ancient]] [[red dragon]]s living in [[the Ridge]], allowing most of his tribe to escape to the southern reaches of the forest.
